channel.title: Bluesky on Deuts Log
channel.description: Recent content in Bluesky on Deuts Log

item.title: @deuts.hamili.net 3ldnhhfg4ec2n
item.description: This Viber Business Inbox is a total trash. You will need to turn off each business one by one, every time a new business pops up in your inbox. There’s no option to disable it altogether! #Viber is a total trash! Why would someone else use this app?
item.content:encoded: This Viber Business Inbox is a total trash. You will need to turn off each business one by one, every time a new business pops up in your inbox. There’s no option to disable it altogether! #Viber is a total trash! Why would someone else use this app?

item.title: @deuts.hamili.net 3ldna2goaw22n
item.description: My #GoToSocial instance has been running for less than a week, and the folder is using up to 1.7Gb already. I wonder how are the other users’ experience so far? #Fediverse #Mastodon
item.content:encoded: My #GoToSocial instance has been running for less than a week, and the folder is using up to 1.7Gb already. I wonder how are the other users’ experience so far? #Fediverse #Mastodon

item.title: @deuts.hamili.net 3ldmpxvrhcc2n
item.description: Tried many todo/tasks app. Even selfhosted: Vikunja, Tududi. But I still keep coming back to RememberTheMilk. Why?
item.content:encoded: Tried many todo/tasks app. Even selfhosted: Vikunja, Tududi. But I still keep coming back to RememberTheMilk. Why?

item.title: @deuts.hamili.net 3ldj7n3jhz22o
item.description: If you own a domain name, why would you wanna keep your #Bluesky handle at @username.bsky.social?
item.content:encoded: If you own a domain name, why would you wanna keep your #Bluesky handle at @username.bsky.social?

item.title: @deuts.hamili.net 3ldj4vta6ds2o
item.description: One day, I’ll finally take #Proxmox for a spin—because why settle for simplicity when you can have a full-blown virtualization playground?
item.content:encoded: One day, I’ll finally take #Proxmox for a spin—because why settle for simplicity when you can have a full-blown virtualization playground?

item.description: It seems like every hour #blinko is updated. github.com/∞

item.title: @deuts.hamili.net 3ldj35gwuls2h
item.description: Is there any documentation of the PDS API that I missed from my search that I can browse? @whtwnd.com whtwnd.com/∞
item.content:encoded: Is there any documentation of the PDS API that I missed from my search that I can browse? @whtwnd.com whtwnd.com/∞

item.title: @deuts.hamili.net 3ldiyghvqhs2h
item.description: 6 reasons to host your own DNS server at home. If the primary reason is really for ad blocking, I think you’re pretty much covered with NextDNS www.xda-developers.com/∞
item.content:encoded: 6 reasons to host your own DNS server at home. If the primary reason is really for ad blocking, I think you’re pretty much covered with NextDNS www.xda-developers.com/∞
